sn35.63:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo yena bhagavā … pe …
sn35.63:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.63:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ekavihārī hoti, kittāvatā ca pana sadutiyavihārī hotī”ti?
sn35.63:5.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:5.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.63:5.6: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:5.8: Santi kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:5.9: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:5.10: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.63:5.13: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:5.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni;
sn35.63:6.1: Santi ca kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:6.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:6.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.63:6.6: Nandisaṃyojanavisaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati … pe …
sn35.63:6.7: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.63:6.8: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:6.9: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:6.10: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.63:6.13: Nandisaṃyojanavippayutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:6.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi gāmante viharati ākiṇṇo bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
